caption: Andrew Stephenson, the Conservative Party chairman, with Liz Truss, the incoming prime minister, at party headquarters Monday.
image_1.context: Three decades later, Ms. Truss, now 47 and known as Liz, will travel to a Scottish castle on Tuesday to be anointed by Queen Elizabeth II as Britain’s new prime minister, completing a political odyssey from rabble-rousing LONDON — As a passionate 19- year-old student at Oxford in 1994, Elizabeth Truss called for a referendum to abolish the British monarchy, telling an audience of fellow Liberal Democrats, “We do not believe that people should be born to rule.” By MARK LANDLER One Million Migrants Admitted Into U.S. During Biden’s Tenure A Hawkish Political Disrupter To Lead a Nation Facing Crisis spill over into Britain’s relations with the United States, which opposes any kind of disruptive change.  In a brief, businesslike speech to members of her party after her victory was confirmed, Ms. Truss promised a “bold plan” to lower taxes and revive the economy. “I campaigned as a Conservative, and I will govern as a Conservative,” she declared. “We will deliver, we will deliver and we will deliver.” Critics said Ms. Truss’s call for tax cuts and smaller government was inadequate in the face of the dire economic threats bearing down on Britain. Many expect her Continued on Page A10
image_1.description: The image captures a moment between two individuals, presumably Andrew Stephenson and Liz Truss, as they shake hands outside a building. The man on the left is dressed in a blue suit with a colorful striped tie, while the woman on the right is wearing a purple dress. Both are smiling warmly, suggesting a friendly and cordial interaction. The background shows a white wall with a 'No Smoking' sign, indicating that this scene takes place outside a building, likely party headquarters given the context. There is another person partially visible in the background, dressed in dark clothing. The overall atmosphere is one of professionalism and positive engagement.

image_2.context: mate resilience. Last year, when Nevada suffered one of the worst droughts on record, beaver pools kept his cattle with enough water. When rains came strangely hard and fast, the vast network of dams slowed a torrent of water raging down the mountain, protecting his hay crop. And with the beavers’ help, creeks have widened into wetlands that run through the sagebrush desert, cleaning water, birthing new meadows and creating a buffer against wildfires. True, beavers can be complicated partners. They’re wild, swimming rodents the size of Beavers’ landscape-altering dams and ponds disrupt agriculture, but they also have big benefits. of his property, Cottonwood Ranch, and drying out others. But his son Agee, who eventually took over the ranch, is making peace. And he says welcoming beavers to work on the land is one of the best things he’s done. “They’re very controversial still,” said Mr. Smith, whose father died in 2014. “But it’s getting better. People are starting to wake up.” As global warming intensifies droughts, floods and wildfires, Mr. Smith has become one of a growing number of ranchers, scientists and other “beaver believers” who see the creatures not only as helpers, but as furry weapons of cli
image_2.description: The image depicts a beaver swimming in a calm body of water, likely a pond or a slow-moving river. The beaver is positioned towards the right side of the image, with its head and part of its body visible above the water surface. The water is relatively still, creating a mirror-like reflection of the surrounding vegetation. The background shows tall grasses and reeds along the edge of the water, indicating a natural wetland habitat. The beaver's fur appears dark brown, and its posture suggests it is moving forward through the water. The overall atmosphere of the image is serene and natural, capturing the beaver in its typical environment.

image_3.context: Suspect in Knife Attacks Is Dead A day after 10 people died and 18 were hurt in one of the worst episodes of stabbing violence in Canada, one of the two suspects was found dead. image_3.description: The image captures a vibrant and energetic parade scene. The central figure is a woman with long braided hair, dressed in a traditional costume featuring a yellow top with intricate patterns and a skirt made of layered fringes. She is dancing energetically with her arms outstretched, embodying the spirit of celebration. Surrounding her are other participants, also dressed in colorful costumes with dominant shades of yellow, orange, and blue, adorned with feathers and beads. The background shows a street lined with spectators and barriers, indicating a public event. The atmosphere is one of joy and cultural pride, with the participants engaged in lively dance movements. The overall scene conveys a sense of community and festivity, typical of a cultural parade.

image_4.description: The image captures a dramatic moment of a humpback whale breaching out of the ocean. The whale is positioned in the center of the frame, with its body mostly vertical and its head and pectoral fins emerging from the water. The whale's skin is dark gray with lighter patches, and it appears to be covered in small barnacles or other marine growth. Water droplets are visible around the whale, indicating the force of its movement. The background shows a clear blue sky with no clouds, suggesting a sunny day. The ocean is calm with gentle waves, and the horizon line is visible in the distance. The overall atmosphere conveys a sense of power and majesty as the whale performs this impressive display.

image_5.description: The image captures a moment from a tennis match featuring a male player in action. The player is wearing a white headband and a white wristband on his left wrist, with a green watch on his right wrist. He is dressed in a white shirt with orange sleeves and is holding a tennis racket with a colorful string pattern. His posture suggests he is in the middle of a backhand swing, with his eyes focused intently on the ball. The background is a solid blue color, indicating that this is likely a professional tennis court. The player's expression conveys concentration and determination, highlighting the intensity of the match.
